text: Christopher McFarland (August 7, 1861 – May 24, 1918) was a Major League Baseball outfielder for the 1884 Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association. ==External links== *Baseball-Reference page Category:1861 births Category:1918 deaths Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Baltimore Monumentals players
title: Chris McFarland
